plot: Maybe this world is another planet's hell. Aldous Huxley knew the world he lived in. Poet Walpurg looses his mind over it. Sister Anna, dwarfed in her day to day life, blossoms in the cell of a mental institution.
title: The Madman and the Nun
plot_es: Maybe this world is another planet's hell. Aldous Huxley knew the world he lived in. Poet Walpurg looses his mind over it. Sister Anna, dwarfed in her day to day life, blossoms in the cell of a mental institution.
plot_en: Maybe this world is another planet's hell. Aldous Huxley knew the world he lived in. Poet Walpurg looses his mind over it. Sister Anna, dwarfed in her day to day life, blossoms in the cell of a mental institution.
